IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITAMIC MAJESTY' 8 government secret.1765 CABUBt THE iQENOT&PH Note by the First Commissioner of Works (Previous Paper - C.2.1606) With reference to the Cabinet decision in regard to the Cenotaph (Cabinet 45 (20?, Conclusion 3), I have consulted Sir Edwin Lutyens in regard to the wreaths and ribbons and it has been agreed that these are to be in uncoloured stone which, I believe, is in accordance with the wishes of the Cabinet. - (signed) ALFRED MOBS H.M.Office of Works August 9th 19209 I i*)4 i
